base_description: Brown bottle with a yellow pump dispenser.
part_description: The bottle has a cylindrical shape with a yellow pump on top. The pump consists of a nozzle and a collar. The body is dark brown with a label.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism includes a spring and tube inside the bottle. When pressed, the spring compresses, and liquid is drawn up through the tube and dispensed through the nozzle.
external_interaction_description: The bottle is designed to dispense liquid when the pump is pressed by a user. It can be placed on flat surfaces and refilled when empty, interacting with hands and bathroom environments.
